job_tasks.phrase: Gain excitement from clients about Databricks through hands-on evaluation and Spark programming, integrating with the wider cloud ecosystem and 3rd party applications.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the practical application and integration of the Databricks platform, which involves programming (Spark programming) and connecting it with other systems (cloud ecosystem, 3rd party applications), aligning with the definition of developing and integrating software.

job_tasks.phrase: Support your customers by authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications.
job_tasks.justification: Authoring reference architectures, how-tos, and demo applications are tasks that involve creating technical documentation and examples to showcase software capabilities, fitting under the umbrella of software development and integration support.

job_tasks.phrase: Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on building client relationships and understanding their business needs to deliver value, which directly maps to understanding the business context and aligning technical solutions with strategic goals.

job_tasks.phrase: Become a Big Data Analytics advisor on aspects of architecture and design.
job_tasks.justification: Acting as an advisor on architecture and design implies understanding the business needs and translating them into technical strategies, aligning with the definition of business understanding and strategy.

job_tasks.phrase: Develop both technically and in the pre-sales aspect with the goal of becoming an independently operating Solutions Architect.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase highlights the development of both technical skills and pre-sales acumen, with the ultimate goal of becoming a Solutions Architect, which requires a strong understanding of business needs and how to position technical solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: Form successful relationships with clients throughout your assigned territory to provide technical and business value in collaboration with an Account Executive and a Senior Solutions Architect.
soft_skills.justification: This phrase explicitly mentions forming relationships and collaborating with clients and internal teams, which falls under communication and collaboration.

soft_skills.phrase: Contribute to building the Databricks technical through engagement at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups.
soft_skills.justification: Engaging at workshops, seminars, and meet-ups to contribute to the technical community indicates a collaborative and knowledge-sharing effort.

soft_skills.phrase: You will be an essential part of this mission, using your technical expertise to demonstrate how our Databricks Data Intelligence Platform can help customers solve their complex data challenges.
soft_skills.justification: Being an essential part of a mission and using expertise to solve customer challenges implies taking ownership and driving solutions.

soft_skills.phrase: You'll work with a collaborative, customer-focused team that values innovation and creativity, using your skills to create customized solutions to help our customers achieve their goals and guide their businesses forward.
soft_skills.justification: The emphasis on innovation, creativity, and creating customized solutions points towards a role that requires initiative and ownership.

profile.rationale: The job advertisement focuses heavily on software engineering tasks such as Spark programming, integrating with cloud ecosystems and third-party applications, and authoring technical documentation (reference architectures, how-tos, demo applications). While it mentions 'Data Science/ML, Cloud' in the title, the core responsibilities described are centered around the application and demonstration of a data platform (Databricks) to solve customer data challenges, rather than the development or fine-tuning of AI/ML models themselves. There are no explicit mentions of Generative AI tasks like prompt engineering, RAG, or model training/fine-tuning. The role is about enabling customers to use the platform effectively, which is a form of integrating AI/ML capabilities into a product/service context. Therefore, it aligns best with an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer profile.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad clearly outlines responsibilities related to software integration and customer-facing technical value demonstration. However, the mention of 'Data Science/ML' in the title could imply some deeper ML involvement than the described tasks suggest, creating a slight ambiguity. The absence of any specific AI/ML model development or GenAI tasks makes the 'AI-Adjacent Software Engineer' profile the most likely, but a more explicit description of the AI/ML components would increase confidence.
